remarks:
An ordinal is less than or equal to its sum with another.  Part of Exercise 5 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 62.  (For the other part see ~ oaord1 .) (Contributed by NM, 6-Dec-2004.) 

---

 An ordinal is less than or equal to its sum with another.  Part of Exercise 5 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 62.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Dec-2004.)
statement: oaword1 $p |- ( ( A e. On /\ B e. On ) -> A C_ ( A +o B ) ) $.
